issues.description: In the problem statement’s Part 2 description, it says “Each method takes a Consumer<List<Note>> parameter … This consumer takes the internal list of persons as a parameter,” but in both the template and solution the PersonController methods use Consumer<List<Person>>. This copy-paste type mismatch between the spec and code can confuse students about the correct generic type to implement.
issues.suggested_fix: Correct the problem statement to refer to Consumer<List<Person>> (not Consumer<List<Note>>) for the PersonController methods.
